battleships

Class Shipyard

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleships.Shipyard

  • public class Shipyard
extends Object
    Contains all the Ships of current game and provides methods that retrieve ships or information about ships.
    Author:
    strohm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shipyard()
      Constructs a new shipyard creating lists for each ship type: line, L-shape and U-shape ships

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areAllSunken()
      Goes through all ships in shipyard and returns true if all ships are sunken.
      void buildShip(int shipId, int x, int y, String form)
      Creates a new Ship and adds it to the corresponding list of ships according to it's form.
      int getLine() 
      int getlShape() 
      Ship getShip(int shipId)
      Method searches ship through all the ship lists for one that matches the shipId by the given parameter.
      int getuShape() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shipyard

        public Shipyard()
        Constructs a new shipyard creating lists for each ship type: line, L-shape and U-shape ships

    • Method Detail

      • areAllSunken

        public boolean areAllSunken()
        Goes through all ships in shipyard and returns true if all ships are sunken.
        Returns:
        true if all ships are sunken.

      • getLine

        public int getLine()
        Returns:
        amount of line ships that are not sunken.

      • getlShape

        public int getlShape()
        Returns:
        amount of L-shaped ships that are not sunken.

      • getuShape

        public int getuShape()
        Returns:
        amount of U-shaped ships that are not sunken.

      • buildShip

        public void buildShip(int shipId,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      String form)
        Creates a new Ship and adds it to the corresponding list of ships according to it's form.
        Parameters:
        shipId - id of ship being built.
        x - coordinate x of ships head which is to be built.
        y - coordinate y of ships head which is to be built.
        form - ships designated form.

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip(int shipId)
        Method searches ship through all the ship lists for one that matches the shipId by the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        shipId - id of ship which is being searched.
        Returns:
        Ship with the corresponding id to the parameter shipId.
